General.Name: Ibraco Bhd
General.Description: Ibraco Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction and development of properties in Malaysia. It operates through four segments: Property Development, Property Holding and Management, Quarry Operations, and Construction Works. The company develops and sells residential and commercial properties; and constructs residential and commercial properties, and infrastructure works. It also engages in the plantation and landscaping operations; quarry operations and sale of stone products; trading of building materials and related products; sale of stone products; property management activities; and leasing of retail and education facilities. The company was formerly known as Ibraco Realty Development Sdn Bhd. and changed its name to Ibraco Berhad in August 2003. The company was incorporated in 1971 and is based in Kuching, Malaysia.
